0.1.name: wordpress/shelter
0.1.description: Child-Theme of Ground Floor - Richly toned wood floor background with bare-earth colored widgetized sidebar and footer (six widget areas in total, as shown on the included widget-map.png). A strong theme to begin with; grow into; and, build on.
